node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於元朗新田石湖圍。患者為一名市區的士司機，他駕駛的的士車牌號碼為 JW9897 ，最後上班日期為 2 月 16 日。他自 2 月 8 日起出現發燒和咳嗽徵狀，於 2 月 10 日及 17 日向同一名私家醫生求診。他於 2 月 18 日到北區醫院求醫，19 日因昏厥而入住該院接受治療。患者於潛伏期內沒有外遊，其同住的妻子及兒子沒有出現病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient, with good past health, lives in Shek Wu Wai, San Tin, Yuen Long. He is an urban taxi driver whose taxi bears registration number JW9897. His last working day was Feb 16. He started developing a fever and coughs on Feb 8 and consulted a private doctor on Feb 10 and 17. He sought treatment from North District Hospital on Feb 18. He was found collapsed the following day and thus was admitted to the hospital again for treatment. He had no travel history during the incubation period. His wife and son have not shown any symptoms.

node.location_en: San Tin, Shek Wu Wai Road
node.remarks_zh: 患者過往健康良好，自 2 月 8 日起出現發燒和咳嗽。
node.remarks_en: He developed fever and cough since Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 因昏厥而再次到北區醫院並入住接受治療。呼吸道樣本證實對新型肺炎病毒呈陽性反應，現時情況穩定。
node.remarks_en: He was admitted to North District Hospital for treatment on Feb 19 due to syncope, after visited the same hospital the day before. His respiratory sample was tested positive for novel coronavirus and he is now in a stable condition.

node.location_zh: 安慈路 4 號昌運中心商場
node.location_en: Fortune Plaza Arcade, 4 On Chee Road
node.remarks_zh: 於 2 月 10 日及 2 月 17 日向同一名私家醫生求診。
node.remarks_en: He consulted a private doctor on Feb 10 and 17.

node.remarks_zh: 衛生署呼籲曾於 1 月 25 日至 2 月 16日期間乘搭該的士的乘客，請致電衞生防護中心熱線（電話號碼：2125 1122）。
node.remarks_en: CHP urged passengers who took the taxi between Jan 25 and Feb 16 to call hotline: 2125 1122.
